item.title: Owed to Circoloco Mix
item.description: Phillip Charles - Owed to Circoloco Mix- 1) Pirupa feat. Bajka-Trust-(Gregorythme Remix) 2) Clockwork- It's You Again-(Lee Foss meets Robert James in the Art Department Remix) 3) Maceo Plex- Stay High Baby 4) Gregorythme feat. Tigerlily- No Time No Space - (Lee Jones Remix) 5) Locodice- - Consequently Eccentric and Delicate 6) Samuel Dan- Hope She Ain't Late 7) James What- ZOD (Damian Lazarus - Rise Before Zod Remix) 8) Paneoh-Lateral (Tigerskin Remix) 9) Monkey B-Forward Funk-(M Nus Remix) 10) Cockney Lama- Losing Like A Man(Stimming Remix) 11) White March-We Love

item.title: Midiradio.net Mix 2012
item.description: Radio show for Midiradio.net in Greece...aired 3/16/2012 Tracklist- Saarid - Future Lately Feat. Javi (Walker & Royce Remix) Ben Hoo - Jasmine (App Remix) Beckers/Dnox - What I Have (Uto Karem Remix) Nicole Moudaber - Beyond Borders (Bart Skils Remix) Nicole Moudaber - Let Go Reset robot - Moozboosh (Original Mix) Carlos Castano - Sirena (Original Vocal Mix) Nick Muir/John Digweed - 30 Northeast (Julian Jeweil Remix) Kiko - Circular (Original Mix) Indepth - Lunar Park (Futur-E Remix) Futur-E - Hephaestos (Original Mix)

item.title: Phillip Charles - Season of the Witch Mix
item.description: Phillip Charles - Season of the Witch Mix- Oct 2011 1) Danny Daze- Your Everything feat. Louisahhh 2) Tom Flynn- Keep Listening 3) Aerodroemme- Drum Bum- Simone De Caro Remix 4) Secret Cinema And Kalden Bess- Pow Pow 5) Sam Paganini- Cobra 6) Dino Lenny & Amnesia- Sex On Drugs 7) Marco Bailey- Frontline- Patrick Siech Remix 8) Stanley Ross- Human Losses 9) Dyno - Vinci (Dandi & Ugo Remix) 10) Marco Bailey & Dany Rodriguez - Experiment 11) Spektre-Subfractal- Ram Raid- Sasha Carrasi Remix 12) Citizen Kain & Phuture Traxx- The Worm Running Time 1:00.27

item.title: "Turnin the Crank"
item.description: Late nighter at its finest level....sit back and drop this one in the car system, you won't be disappointed....stay thirsty! 1) BT- Every Other Way Feat. Jes - (Phunk Investigation Remix) 2) Marshall (aka Luigi Rocca)- Just Believe 3) DJ Wady, Patrick M- Hulk- DJ Chus, DJ Wady & Patrick M Vocal Mix 4) Jose Nunez, Nick & Danny Chatelain, Harry Choo Choo Romero- Lifting Me High - DJ DLG Movin Mix 5) Marco Demark, Dave Manna- America - LYS Remix 6) Mark Knight, Wolfgang Gartner- Conscindo - Original Club Mix 7) Mark Knight, Dirty South- Stopover - Tocadisco Remix 8) Dave Seaman, Funkagenda- The Mighty Ming - D.Ramirez Remix 9) Victor Calderone, Carlos Fauvrelle- Out There - Carlo Lio Mix 10) Steve Angello - Knas 11) Kotov & Andre Wilde- You Can Bounce
item.dc:creator: Phillip Charles
